headline: Cleveland-Cliffs and Nucor Shine: Goldman Bets Big on U.S. Steel Growth
summary: Goldman Sachs backs Cleveland-Cliffs and Nucor as U.S. steel leaders, citing demand and strategic initiatives

headline: Goldman Sachs Says These 2 Steel Stocks Are a ‘Buy’ Amid Improving Fundamentals
summary: The art of stock investing lies in identifying the right equities to buy. One effective approach is focusing on core economic sectors – industries that sustain the foundations of modern life. Among these, basic commodities like steel play a crucial role, serving as the building blocks of countless essential activities. While steel is highly cyclical, it’s also a key material in multiple essential industries – the automotive, machinery, and construction markets, to name just a few, all depend on
